RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELUNICODECANDY drifted out, best. GRAND MAJESTY steady drive, drifted in. BULLY GIRL hard fought loss. APOLLITICAL SPLASH bumped, evenly. J BEST PLEASURE no meance. FOOLS CARTEL bumped, no kick. LUXURY PAINT no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Bully Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard fought loss

ENTRY.NAME: Elunicodecandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, best

ENTRY.NAME: Apollitical Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Fools Cartel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: J Best Pleasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: no meance

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Majesty
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady drive, drifted in

ENTRY.NAME: Luxury Paint
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZORINA was off the pace to the turn then made a three wide bid around the turn to engage the leader at the three sixteenths pole, dueled down the stretch and prevailed. LONG MAY SHE RUN bumped at the start with inside rival then rushed up between horses at the half mile marker and took the lead to the top of the stretch and was headed by two outside rivals and dueled down the stretch but was outnodded. MAYA D broke well to prompt the pace from three wide to the three furlong marker and fell back slightly, made a rebid going into the stretch from between horses and engaged the leader, moved out to three of four wide at the eighth pole but lacked a late kick. SNUGGLE BUNNY was allowed to settle through the turn then made a mid track rally to improve position. I'M GONE vied for the lead from the inside to the seven sixteenths pole but failed to menace. FLY FREE bumped with outside rival at the start then was shuffled back at the half mile marker, made a mild bid on the turn but was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Snuggle Bunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mid track rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, shuffled back, mild bid turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Long May She Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, between 1/2, headed 3/16, stretch duel, outnodded

ENTRY.NAME: Zorina
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wturn, engaged leader, stretch duel, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Maya D
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, prompt pace 3w, engaged 3/16, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EZ FITZ raced in the middle of the pack to the turn then made a rail bid to mid turn, angled out to two wide and ran down the leader to clear late for the win. SHUDDER rushed up to take a clear lead at the half mile marker and held that position to deep stretch and tired. TAP TAP HUSTO trailed the field to the turn then saved ground around the turn, moved out to three wide in upper stretch for a late run but was not enough. I'M A TRUMPER was off the pace through the turn then moved out to four wide in upper stretch but only chased the leaders. PALACE PATCH raced in the middle of the pack while racing four wide around the turn, angled in nearing the eighth pole but was not a factor. CHASING THE KING sprinted away from the gate and pressed the early pace then retreated around the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Ez Fitz
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, rail bid, 2wupper, ran down leader, cleared late

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Trumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4wupper, chased leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing the King
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, press early pace, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Patch
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 4wturn, angled in 1/8, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Shudder
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Tap Husto
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, saved ground turn, 3wupper, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 5800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $3500 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $5000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OPTIMAL rushed up to take the lead at the half mile marker, set a pressured pace then was challenged in the stretch drive but dug in and drew clear. SILVER AND ACES was off the pace to mid turn then was coaxed at and made a three wide bid to engage the top two nearing the eighth pole and proved second best. LIL LATIGO pressed the pace from two wide to the eighth pole and gave way grudgingly. THORNISH trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Optimal
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, led 1/2, challenged stretch, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Thornish
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Latigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Silver and Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wbid turn, engaged 1/8, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 4800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARTSTER was forced out at the start then was roused to co-led to the three furlong marked and edged away slightly but was challenged going in the stretch and was headed at the top of the stretch but came again to win the photo. SWAY BACK WHEN was off the pace on the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker and engaged the leader at the top of the stretch and match strides down the stretch but was out nodded. BATTLEOF TRAFALGAR broke in sharply at the start then rushed up to co-lead to the three furlong marker, fell back around the turn but made a late rebid to be up for the show. ENDALE ARCH raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch, made a three wide bid around the turn but was empty in the drive. BARREL MAN was pinched back at the start and passed tired one in the stretch. CORTE hopped at the start and remained back. BIG PEN TEN raced near the back but was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Battleof Trafalgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in sharply, co-led, fell back, rebid for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bartster
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out start, co-led, headed, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Barrel Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back start, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Sway Back When
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wbid 3/8, engaged leaders, outnodded

ENTRY.NAME: Corte
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Endale Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wturn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Big Pen Ten
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 12500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PARTYOFSIXTEEN prompted the pace from between horses to the half mile marker then fell back and made a rebid from three wide at the three furlong marker to engage the leader at the quarter pole and drove past for a clear victory. QUICKTRIP VAN was hustled to the lead for a half then was headed at the quarter pole and fought gamely to prove second best. MY MAN BIGGIE raced near the back early then steadily advanced from three wide and was up for the show. ROCKYMOUNTAINTWIST was roused to the front to vie for the lead around the turn and engaged the leader at the quarter pole and tired at the eighth pole. THREE FOR THREE raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground around the turn then moved out to four wide in upper stretch and finished evenly. GUEST CHECK was off the pace to the quarter pole and weakened. KNIGHTED trailed through the final turn and was not a factor. PRECEDENT was off the pace for the first quarter and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Quicktrip Van
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustle to lead, headed 1/4 fought gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Knighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Biggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, steady advance, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Guest Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Three for Three
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, 4wupper, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Partyofsixteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, fell back, 3w3/8, engaged 1/4, drove past

ENTRY.NAME: Rockymountaintwist
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, engaged 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Precedent
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Oaks ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 53. Stakes Purse 36418. THREE YEAR OLD COLORADO BRED FILLIES. Weight 122 lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTY GIRL prompted the pace from two wide for a half then engaged the leader at the quarter pole and took the lead at the three sixteenths pole and drew clear to prove best. BRING THE POSSE trailed the field early then made a rail bid to mid turn and angled out to three wide in upper stretch for a late run but was too late. MS BUMBLEBEE was forwardly place down the backstretch fell back slightly on the turn, moved out to four wide in upper stretch and showed late effort but was no match for top two. JUST A SEC raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then moved up going into the turn while saving ground but lacked room at the top of the stretch and weakened but was able to pass a tired on in the drive. FLYING LADY raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then moved up from three wide around the turn and tipped out to five wide in upper stretch to improve position. IMA HOT TOTTIE went to the front to set the pace for a half then was headed at the quarter pole and tired. YA THINK raced near the back and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Bring the Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, rail bid turn, 3wupper, late run, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Hot Tottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, headed 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wturn, 5wupper, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Misty Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, engaged 1/4, led 3/16, drew clear, best

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Sec
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, saved ground turn, lacked room, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ya Think
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Bumblebee
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4wupper, late effort, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $3500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $5000 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $6250. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORTHERN QUEST was within striking distance down the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the final turn, moved out to mid track in upper stretch and rallied to just get up for the win. CHEF vied for the lead on the inside around the first turn then settled off the pace down the backstretch, engaged the leader at the three furlong marker and took the lead at the top of the stretch but was nailed in the final jumps. JIMBO'S BIZ was allowed to settle down the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the final turn for a late rally to be up for the show. TIGER BY HIS TAIL went to the front to a pressured lead around the first turn and down the backstretch then was headed at the three furlong marker and matched strides with outside rival to the three sixteenths pole and tired. ITS FIVE SOMEWHERE was unhurried to the first turn then moved up the rail down the backstretch and flattened out. SUEZ raced near the back and passed tiring rivals. TASHKENT was forwardly placed in the early stages and retreated. PERVASIVE raced wide around the first turn and down the backstretch while trailing thoughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Chef
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, settled off pace, engaged 3/8, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger by His Tail
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured lead, headed 3/8, duel turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Its Five Somewhere
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved up, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: striking distance, 3w2nd turn, late rally, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Tashkent
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Suez
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Jimbo's Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3w2nd turn, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Pervasive
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide 1st turn, trailed
